mapper.select: SELECT UNIT_GROUP_NO ,UNIT_GROUP_CD ,GROUP_NAME ,GROUP_DESC ,ACTION_DIV ,OPEN_YN ,PASS_YN ,(SELECT CODE_NAME FROM XBT_COMMON_CODE T1 WHERE T1.GROUP_ID = 'actionDiv' AND T1.CODE_VALUE = ACTION_DIV AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode})AS actionDivName ,UNIT_IMG ,LANGUAGE_CODE FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP
SELECT CASE WHEN ACTION_DIV = #{userActionDiv} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS answerYn FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP WHERE UNIT_GROUP_CD = #{unitGroupCd}

SELECT UNIT_INFO_NO , UNIT_SCAN_ID , UNIT_ID /*물품아이디*/ , UNIT_GROUP_CD/*뭎품그룹코드*/
, UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME_EN AS UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME_CH AS AS UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME_JP AS AS UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO XUI WHERE UNIT_GROUP_CD = #{unitGroupCd}

SELECT T2.UNIT_INFO_NO , T2.UNIT_SCAN_ID , T2.UNIT_ID /*물품아이디*/ , T2.UNIT_GROUP_CD/*뭎품그룹코드*/ , (SELECT GROUP_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_GROUP WHERE UNIT_GROUP_CD = T2.UNIT_GROUP_CD and LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode}) as UNIT_GROUP_NAME /*뭎품그룹코드*/ , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM XBT_COMMON_CODE T1 WHERE T1.GROUP_ID = 'actionDiv' AND T1.CODE_VALUE = ACTION_DIV AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND LANGUAGE_CODE = #{languageCode})AS actionDivName
, UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME_EN AS UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME_CH AS AS UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME_JP AS AS UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
, UNIT_NAME /*물품명*/
,T3.ACTION_DIV_NAME FROM XBT_UNIT_INFO T2 inner join XBT_UNIT_GROUP T3 ON T2.UNIT_GROUP_CD = T3.UNIT_GROUP_CD AND T2.UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
